text: Amazing. I can’t tell you the sheer relief and gratitude parents feel to have professionals recognise what they’ve been saying for years!
author: Webinar attendee

text: This session with @naomicfisher was really great. After months of lonely battling to support a child who can't go to school, I'm going to sleep more hopeful.
author: Webinar attendee

text: Really thoughtful and informed session this evening from @naomicfisher. Many of us parents who have been blamed and alienated through our child's extreme distress and non -attendance at school are finally feeling hope for a positive future
author: Webinar attendee

text: Really enjoyed the webinar. Actually feel relieved to know that I’m not the only one as a parent trying to deal with this.
author: Webinar attendee

text: This is one of the best courses I have been on. The voice of reason and over 200 parents thinking “I feel heard”.
author: Webinar attendee

text: I've watched the 'Burnt out by school?' talk and have to say that I was riveted.
author: Webinar attendee

text: Since watching a webinar by @naomicfisher we have more understanding of how to approach Miss 15's school refusal (burnout) and she is now making progress stepping back out into the world, slowly but surely.  Such a huge relief thanks to some expert advice and insights.
author: Webinar attendee

text: I really appreciated your messages of hope- this is a journey and we will come out the end.
author: Webinar attendee

text: After your webinar we are more able to support our daughter, speak to her special setting confidently & already supported better decision making with her needs at the centre.
author: Webinar attendee

text: This has been the most useful thing I have had since my Son was 4 and he is now 14, thank you.
author: Webinar attendee

text: Great to know we're not alone
author: Webinar attendee

text: It’s such a breath of fresh air to feel understood!!
author: Webinar attendee

text: Thank you for this exceptional content.
author: Webinar attendee

text: Your talk has been the best talk I've been to in ages, and i go to a lot!
author: Webinar attendee

text: I wish I'd known all that I learnt in that hour and a half back when I first took my son out of school.
author: Webinar attendee

text: Thanks for the invaluable insight.
author: Webinar attendee

text: Reassuring and comforting.
author: Webinar attendee

text: Thank you so much... everything you have said makes so much sense
author: Webinar attendee

text: I also found it incredibly affirming to hear you talk about and acknowledge the trauma parents experience.
author: Webinar attendee

text: fascinating presentation
I also wanted to say a huge thank you for the webinars you do- they are a lifeline to so many of us.
author: Webinar attendee

text: Your words yesterday really resonated
author: Webinar attendee

text: brilliant, clear and informative
author: Webinar attendee

text: Really insightful and helpful.
author: Webinar attendee

text: Thanks for the invaluable insight.
author: Webinar attendee

text: I very much enjoyed it and found it both reassuring and helpful. The thing I think that has helped me a lot is knowing others feel the same.
author: Webinar attendee

text: I just wanted to send a big thank you to Naomi and Eliza for the hugely supportive low demand in the real world webinar today
author: Webinar attendee

text: Thank you for putting your voice, advocacy and credibility to these challenges so many of us are facing. I love the power you bring to your writing and posts
author: Webinar attendee

text: Thank you for your webinars which have helped in so many ways, not least in making us realize it isn't our parenting. It isn't the 'home problem ' school had told us it was.
author: Webinar attendee

text: I have just watched the webinar. It resonated so much with our current situation with our 14 year old daughter. It made me cry.
author: Webinar attendee

text: It was as ever a brilliant webinar, you and Eliza really do make things better.
author: Webinar attendee
